pullRequest.title: Update portal.properties.EXAMPLE and reference docs to document installation map url
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #8055
Describe changes proposed in this pull request:

Added commented installation_map_url configuration to portal.properties.EXAMPLE
Updated docs and created section on installation_map_url

Any screenshots or GIFs?
If this is a new visual feature please add a before/after screenshot or gif
here with e.g. Giphy CAPTURE or Peek
No screenshots/gifs

nodes.bodyText:
This is a bit misleading - private portals could create their own installation map if they wanted. How about

Installation map URL for installation map iframes. If blank or commented out, no map will be shown and that page will be hidden.`

Update portal.properties.EXAMPLE and reference docs to document installation map url

nodes.bodyText:
This is good, but let's add something about how they can set up their own installation map instance. Something like:

The source code for the installation map can be found here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -170,6 +170,13 @@ By default, the initial x-axis limit for a survival plot is the time of the late
 survival.initial_x_axis_limit=
 ```
 
+## Display installation map
+This setting specifies the URL for the iframes of a given portal's installation map on the homepage and standalone page. By default, the installation map configuration is commented out with the iframes and standalone page hidden. 
+The configuration below is used for https://www.cbioportal.org/.
